name: Pickle!
description:
Start with 36 points/chips, protecting your lowest cards with your higher cards. Hold the lowest card possible to not have the high card at the end of each hand.

Players may lead all cards of matching face value, all following players must match or beat every card of the highest played set or they must play their lowest cards for the entire set.

At the end of each hand, the player or players with the highest cards surrender points/chips, at zero the player or players are eliminated from the game.

The Outburst feature allows user to make comments to the table for gamesmanship or just entertainment. Comments are user created, uncensored and can be modified between games.
